Posts.Content: I am stage 4 - it has been 7 years since my stage 3 diagnosis - 4 years since my stage 4 diagnosis.  I have had ascites (fluid in my abdomen) for 2 years.  Now I have been having it removed twice a week - 3 L. at a time.  Is anyone else battling this?  I have invasive lobular breast cancer.  Patty in Visalia, CA
Posts.Title: Ascites
